column4: Guys i'm looking for a parental control function for my kids' box. anyone who can help me out with a few options?
squid proxy and dansguardian seems to be the way but i've never touched it so that's all I can offer.  I think "christian ubuntu" has it setup by defualt so you could see how they do it
close any programs accessing files on it including any shells with the current working directory in it
I'm in live now. I whas working on my drive with gparted and there is no File system on that drive. So i cant realy be using it
